H0.text: what did james chadwick invent. Proton Accelerator

H1.text: what did james chadwick invent. Geiger Counter

H2.text: what did james chadwick invent. Cyclotron

H3.text: what did james chadwick invent. Neutron

A4.text: Sir James Chadwick ... received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1935 for his discovery of the neutron.

A5.text: James Chadwick discovered the neutron in 1932, leading to the discovery of nuclear fission in 1938.

A6.text: In 1935, Chadwick and his doctoral student Maurice Goldhaber reported the first accurate measurement of the mass of the neutron.
